20110110170603.000|20110110170604.000|CC1|HOW ARE YOU?                    
20110110170604.000|20110110170605.000|CC1|WE'RE LEARNING MORE AND MORE    
20110110170605.000|20110110170607.000|CC1|FROM FRIENDS OF JARED AND       
20110110170607.000|20110110170609.000|CC1|CLASSMATES AND ACQUAINTANCES.   
20110110170609.000|20110110170611.000|CC1|THEY PAINT A PICTURE OF SOMEBODY
20110110170611.000|20110110170613.000|CC1|WHO IS A TROUBLED LONER, WHOSE  
20110110170613.000|20110110170614.000|CC1|MAY HAVE WAS MORE OFTEN         
20110110170614.000|20110110170616.000|CC1|CONFUSING THAN FRIGHTENING.     
20110110170616.000|20110110170617.000|CC1|ALTHOUGH SOME WHO CROSSED PATHS 
20110110170617.000|20110110170619.000|CC1|WITH HIM IN THE PAST YEAR SAY   
20110110170619.000|20110110170620.000|CC1|THEY WERE CONVINCED THAT THE    
20110110170620.000|20110110170623.000|CC1|WORST WAS YET TO COME.

20110110170624.000|20110110170628.000|CC1|SCHOOL, JARED LEE LOUGHNER WAS  
20110110170628.000|20110110170629.000|CC1|SOMEWHAT SHY.                   
20110110170629.000|20110110170630.000|CC1|>> HE WAS REALLY FUNNY.         
20110110170630.000|20110110170632.000|CC1|HIS LAUGH WAS HYSTERICAL.       
20110110170632.000|20110110170633.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BY LAST SPRING,    
20110110170633.000|20110110170635.000|CC1|THOUGH, DAWN CORA SAID HE WAS NO
20110110170635.000|20110110170636.000|CC1|LONGER FUNNY.                   
20110110170636.000|20110110170637.000|CC1|THEY WERE IN A POETRY CLASS     
20110110170637.000|20110110170640.000|CC1|TOGETHER AT PIMA COLLEGE WHERE  
20110110170640.000|20110110170642.000|CC1|SHE SAYS HE INSULTED CLASSMATES 
20110110170642.000|20110110170643.000|CC1|REGULARLY AND DELIVERED HIS OWN 
20110110170643.000|20110110170645.000|CC1|POEMS IN JARRING PERFORMANCES   
20110110170645.000|20110110170646.000|CC1|THAT ALWAYS SEEMED              
20110110170646.000|20110110170646.000|CC1|INAPPROPRIATE.                  
20110110170646.000|20110110170650.000|CC1|>> JUMPING AROUND THE ROOM,     
20110110170650.000|20110110170651.000|CC1|GRABBING HIS CROTCH, POINTING AT
20110110170651.000|20110110170651.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110110170651.000|20110110170653.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IN FACT, IN ANOTHER
20110110170653.000|20110110170658.000|CC1|CLASS, LOUGHNER'S OUTBURSTS MADE
20110110170658.000|20110110170701.000|CC1|SORENSON SO UNCOMFORTABLE, SHE  
20110110170701.000|20110110170703.000|CC1|E-MAILED A FRIEND.              
20110110170703.000|20110110170704.000|CC1|HE IS ONE OF THOSE WHOSE PICTURE
20110110170704.000|20110110170706.000|CC1|YOU SEE ON THE NEWS, AFTER HE   
20110110170706.000|20110110170708.000|CC1|HAS COME INTO CLASS WITH AN     
20110110170708.000|20110110170709.000|CC1|AUTOMATIC WEAPON.               
20110110170709.000|20110110170710.000|CC1|>> HE MADE THE HAIRS ON THE BACK
20110110170710.000|20110110170711.000|CC1|OF MY NECK STAND UP.            
20110110170711.000|20110110170713.000|CC1|HE FRIGHTENED ME.               
20110110170713.000|20110110170714.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE SCHOOL EXPELLED
20110110170714.000|20110110170716.000|CC1|HIM PENDING A MENTAL HEALTH     
20110110170716.000|20110110170717.000|CC1|CLEARANCE SHOWING HE WAS NOT A  
20110110170717.000|20110110170717.000|CC1|DANGER.                         
20110110170717.000|20110110170719.000|CC1|AND THEN MORE BAD NEWS WHEN HE  
20110110170719.000|20110110170720.000|CC1|TRIED TO ENLIST IN THE ARMY, HE 
20110110170720.000|20110110170721.000|CC1|WAS REJECTED.                   
20110110170721.000|20110110170723.000|CC1|IN NOVEMBER, AUTHORITIES SAY HE 
20110110170723.000|20110110170724.000|CC1|BOUGHT HIS GUN.

20110110171154.000|20110110171154.000|CC1|>> IT'S VERY BASIC.
